programme.title: Simpang Jalan

programme.title: Wheely

programme.title: Senario Ops Pocot
programme.desc: Pelbagai kejadian lucu ditempuhi oleh 3 pemuda yang mendaftarkan diri di kem RELA untuk mengubah hidup mereka. Lakonan Azli, Wahid & Mazlan.

programme.title: Kupu Kupu Air

programme.desc: Saksikan drama bersiri 'i-Tanggang' setiap Isnin, 9 malam di saluran Astro Citra.

programme.title: Otajin

programme.title: Spicy Killers
programme.desc: Kisah ibu dan 3 anak perempuannya yang hidup diselubungi ketakutan akibat didera oleh ayah mereka menyebabkan kehidupan mereka penuh dengan dendam dan tragedi berdarah.

programme.title: Strawberi Cinta
programme.desc: Ichigo yang datang ke Malaysia untuk mencari sesuatu, bertemu dengan Hakimi, seorang pemandu pelancong. Dapatkah Ichigo bertemu dengan apa yang dicari?

programme.title: Kamar Seksa
programme.desc: 2 kisah di dalam 1 filem. Kisah pertama mengenai pembantu rumah cuba untuk melepaskan diri dari majikannya. Kisah kedua mengenai isteri yang perlu bekerja menampung keluarga selepas suaminya dibuang kerja.

programme.title: Karya 12-Wau Kasih
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang kisah pengorbanan seorang ayah untuk membantu keluarga namun ianya disalah erti oleh anak-anaknya.

programme.title: Rendang Krispi'e

programme.title: Kupilih Jalanku Sendiri

programme.desc: Dalam episod ini, Wafiy menerangkan dengan lebih lanjut tentang coding. Adakah ianya hanya nombor? Atau sekumpulan perkataan dan nombor yang susah untuk difahami?

programme.title: Dekoded Ep03
programme.desc: Dalam episod ini, Wafiy memberi anda beberapa tips asas untuk cara merakam video menggunakan telefon pintar anda. Rule of thirds? Tripod alternatif? Aksesori lensa kamera?

programme.title: STEMsasi! Ep01
programme.desc: Bagaimana wi-fi dapat berfungsimembekalkan internet? Bolehkah gelombang Wi-Fi menembusi dinding? Wafiy cubamencari jawapannya dalam episod kali ini.

programme.title: STEMsasi! Ep02
programme.desc: Memang seronok main game dengan set virtual reality (VR) ni. Tapi, betul ke VR hanyauntuk gaming? Atau ada pelbagai fungsi lain? Bersama Wafiy kita teroka mengenaiteknologi VR.

programme.title: STEMsasi! Ep03
programme.desc: Dengan sedikit asas coding atau bahasa kod, kita boleh bina aplikasi kita sendiri. Takpercaya, saksikan Wafiy berkongsi tentang semua ini dalam STEMsasi!

programme.title: Geng Gajet Ep05

programme.title: SMK Study Squad Ep01

programme.title: Oh My English! Musim Ke-3 (HD) Ep01

programme.title: Best of Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East
programme.desc: A look at the week's most important business and financial issues shaping global markets, with a focus on the Middle East.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live market reports from London and overnight news from Wall Street. Markets never sleep and neither does Bloomberg News. Track investments 24 hours a day, around the world.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Europe
programme.desc: Anchored by Anna Edwards and Mark Cudmore, Bloomberg Markets: Europe is a fast-paced hour of news and analysis, building towards the drama and excitement of the start of trading across the continent.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets: European Open kick starts the trading day with Francine Lacqua and Tom Mackenzie live from London bringing you news no investor in Europe can afford to miss.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance: Early Edition
programme.desc: Bloomberg Surveillance: Early Edition with Francine Lacqua live from London, bringing insight on global markets and the top business stories of the day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: The only daily news programme focused exclusively on technology, innovation and the future of business. Hosted by Emily Chang in San Francisco.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Bloomberg Surveillance with Tom Keene, Jonathan Ferro and Lisa Abramowicz live from New York, bringing insight on global markets and the top business stories of the day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Bloomberg Surveillance with Tom Keene, Jonathan Ferro and Lisa Abramowicz live from New York, bringing insight on global markets and the top business stories of the day.

programme.title: Bloomberg: the Open
programme.desc: Jonathan Ferro hosts this programme showcasing the most insightful and informative Bloomberg charts to help position a global audience for the trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
programme.desc: Live from New York, Bloomberg Markets: Americas is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Close
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets: European Close analyses the major market moving stories across the day in Europe, hears from the biggest newsmakers and showcases the unrivalled expertise of Bloomberg News.

programme.title: 12:06 Rumah Kucing
programme.desc: Since his daughter brought home some stray cats, Randy and his family experience frightening phenomena in their home at midnight everyday. Things go out of hand, when their daugher is possessed.

programme.title: Telaga Angker
programme.desc: A pregnant woman is killed when she drives her car into a lake. But soon her spirit returns to exact revenge on those who had caused her death.

programme.title: Anak Perjanjian Syaitan
programme.desc: Due to his mother's pressure and ill treatment, Zaidi and his wife move to a village mansion belonging to his grandmother where they are haunted by strange dreams and the eerie screams of babies.

programme.title: The Gatehouse
programme.desc: Eternity lives with her writer father in a gatehouse near the woods. She loves digging for buried treasure around her home. One day, she finds something she shouldn't have. Now, the forest wants it back.

programme.title: White House
programme.desc: 5 reality show contestants agree to stay in a haunted mansion for the chance to win 1 million pesos.One by one, they are haunted by a mysterious lady in black. What dark secrets are hidden in the mansion?

programme.title: Check-in Shock
programme.desc: The film Check-in Shock is the basis for the story of the reality game show, Check-in Shock. With a focus on hate and malice, contestants step into the realm of curses and feuding evil spirits.

programme.title: The Intruder
programme.desc: An apartment building's owner has to face his most frightening fear as his tenants are torn apart - literally, by the vengeance of demonic cobras.

programme.title: Memoir
programme.desc: An insurance saleswoman meets an old friend to make a sale. Her friend's house is old and eerie. As she starts to leave, a shadow is following closely behind ...

programme.title: Ular Tangga
programme.desc: A group of university students climbs a mountain only to find an old house where dangerous supernatural beings live.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: A homeless man named Thomas finds shelter for the night within a lavish abandoned two-story house. He eventually discovers that he is not alone and the premises won't let him leave.

programme.title: Multiverse: The 13th Step
programme.desc: An adventure of a guy and his friends to learn more about a missing girl who stayed in his house previously.

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: A tale of vengeance that translates as an LSD trip in the sweltering desert heat, replete with satanic cult, biker gang, heavy metal and Nicolas Cage shooting an arrow. Nuff said. A gory fantastical treat!

programme.title: Kolong
programme.desc: In direct need of money, Suri accepts a high-paying job as the caretaker of a blind man, who is said to live in a house haunted by his late wife's spirit.

programme.title: Suraya
programme.desc: YouTubers Nabila and Adam are lost in their pursuit and they end up at a mysterious homestay. They learn that guests who check in to this place rarely ever check out.

programme.title: Rumah Belanda
programme.desc: A writer suffers from something even more terrifying than writers' block, when her writer's retreat turns out to be haunted.

programme.title: Memoir
programme.desc: An insurance saleswoman meets an old friend to make a sale. Her friend's house is old and eerie. As she starts to leave, a shadow is following closely behind ...

programme.title: Malam Satu Suro
programme.desc: A young man marries a woman, not knowing she is a sundel bolong, the spirit of a woman who died during childbirth.

programme.title: Freaks
programme.desc: A disturbed father locks his seven-year-old daughter in his house, warning her of the dangers outside until a mysterious Mr. Snowcone convinces her to join him on his quest for freedom and revenge.

programme.title: Kembang Kantil
programme.desc: Alisa cannot help but be shaken when she meets her adopted niece, Tania, for the first time. Her investigations bring her to an orphanage, where the truth about Tania is finally revealed.

programme.title: The Block
programme.desc: On the night of Friday the 13th, the Black Cat group break into an abandoned sewing factory, simply called Workshop 13, where a security guard hanged himself.

programme.title: Lampor : Keranda Terbang
programme.desc: Upon the arrival of Netta and her family to her hometown in Temanggung, a demon named Lampor comes alive begins to attacks her children as Edwin begins to suspect that she hides a secret from him.

programme.title: Aku Tahu Kapan Kamu Mati
programme.desc: Sienna's ability to see the sign of when people will die, really frightens her. The more she tries to forget, the more people she knows died, one by one.

programme.title: Bekas Rumah Sakit

programme.title: Wu Ming Wei Shi Ep11
programme.desc: This broad selection of drama series genres includes romance, military and family connections, captured in China's great classics.

programme.title: Wu Ming Wei Shi Ep12
programme.desc: This broad selection of drama series genres includes romance, military and family connections, captured in China's great classics.

programme.title: Hex After Hex
programme.desc: In this comedy, hellish emotions are unleashed when a demon arranges to have his true love killed in order to possess her. Starring Lo Meng.

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: Chiao Hsiung plays a bandit who steals from the rich and gives to the poor, all the while risking the threat of his evil nemesis, the evil bounty hunter Wang.

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: When a detective's bullet changes direction in mid-air to zero in on its target, a terrifying supernatural connection comes to light.

programme.title: The Battle Wizard
programme.desc: The peace-loving prince of the Dali nation turns out to be the target for vengeance because of an old romantic feud.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: Loyal to the emperor, the protagonist attempts to stop the delivery of a message depicted across twelve gold medallions that is to be delivered by traitors.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Sun Chung teams up with real-life kungfu champion Chen Kuan-tai and martial arts choreographer Liu Chia-yung to tell the tale of a bandit with a conscience.

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: Action king, David Chiang plays Wei Feng, who is sent to investigate the suspicious Tien family. However, he never expects to fall for the beautiful Chi.

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Two women and a man have to deal with forgery, fire and poisoned needles when they go up against a notorious gang.

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A Robin Hood-like burglar must outwit the corrupt police chief who seeks to unmask him. Starring Yueh Hua, Connie Chan Po Chu.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Following the lives of three downtrodden, but resilient outcasts, John Lo Mar's gritty social drama paints a sense of realism rarely seen in Hong Kong movies.

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: Director Chang Cheh joins forces with Ni Kuang and martial arts choreographer Liu Chia-liang to craft this brilliant saga from the golden age of kung fu films.

programme.title: One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: The first make HK$1 million at the local box office, Chang Cheh's Wuxia film sparked a new age in martial arts films with its male anti-heroes and violence.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: In true Huangmei opera style, lovely Li Hsiang-chun stars as a used and abused beauty in director Kao Li's restrained, as well as sadistic tearjerker.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Lauded as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals of the 60s, this award-winning piece starring Linda Lin Dai as a dancer who finds romance with her boss's son.

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese
programme.desc: This 1972 cult classic stars Lily Ho in her most audacious role as a mysterious courtesan caught in a web of sex and murder with her powerful madam.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: This epic depicts the romance between the Jade Emperor's seventh daughter and a young village man. When Heaven and Earth meet, can a common ground be found?

programme.title: Return to the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: In this comedic sequel to the 36th Chamber of Shaolin, Gordon Liu is hired to impersonate the 36th Chamber's founder!

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: Catch this rare gem, a product of Hong Kong-style science fiction, complete with out-of-this-world visual effects.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Directed by Chang Cheh and starring Ti Lung in his first main role, this drama depicts how two lovers contend with family opposition and an unjust accusation.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Starring Chin Han, Wang Ping and Tsung Hua, this movie revolves around the challenges that beset three sworn brothers and sisters.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: In this chapter of the 'Journey to the West' saga, the Monkey King and his gang are confronted by a whole host of fanciful villains.

programme.title: Return of the One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: The retired one-armed swordsman made his reappearance to fight against the brutal robbers and protect the peace of the martial art world.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this sequel, the Mad Monk is joined by immortal scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin, as they both wreak havoc in an attempt to outdo each other!

programme.title: The Sword and the Lute
programme.desc: Kwei Wu and his partner go on a mission to destroy the Phoenix Lute, a deadly weapon that shoots poisonous needles and can only be destroyed by the Kan sword.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: Director Chan Friend joins award-winning social satirist Alfred Cheung Kin Ting in this delightful variation on the hugely successful British Carry On!

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Award-winning actor Ku Feng plays the cunning pirate Lei Chen-tien, flanked by Wan Ping who disguises herself as a boy to beat him to the treasure.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: The Shaw Brothers' directors created this 60's classic depicting a timeless romance between a wealthy man and a songbird.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: It's 1991. A university student meets a Taiwanese photographer at a concert at Beijing Workers' Stadium and thus, begins a whirlwind romance with far-reaching implications.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the waning years of the Ming dynasty, a government official is forced to team up with a band of thieves to capture monsters that have escaped from the royal palace.

programme.title: I am Not Madame Bovary
programme.desc: Fan Bing Bing sacrificed her beauty to play an unattractive village woman and earned herself three Best Actress awards in this Feng Xiao Gang-helmed film that has won 14 international awards.

programme.title: Paws-Men
programme.desc: The Paws-Men are protectors of dogs but they encounter a host of challenges. They do, however, get to witness true friendships between dogs and humans. Starring Tats Lau, Chan Lai Wun & Bob Lam.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: Produced by megastar Jay Chou, this drama starring Will Liu & Wang Jun Kai depicts how a former top team racing driver's focus on proving himself leads to his team's downfall.

programme.title: Fooling Around Jiang Hu
programme.desc: A goodhearted gangleader who faces a threat from his assistant fights back the best way he knows how - by singing!

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: This drama depicts how we try to right past wrongs, only to find that those we believe we hurt sometimes have completely different perceptions of the event.

programme.title: Police Story
programme.desc: A Royal Hong Kong police inspector (Jackie Chan) must pull himself up again after a bungled mission caused his entire team to be wiped out.

programme.title: Meow
programme.desc: Since ancient times, the earth has been home to an alien species called Meow. Enter Xi Xili, the latest Meow to visit Earth, who intends to invade the planet when a family takes him in as a pet.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three-armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor & his assistant must put up the fight of their lives to stop them from obtaining a bullet that is a key piece of evidence.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: Renowned conductor Yin Tze Long agrees to lead a pilot program training 3 underperforming school choirs to participate in an inter-school choral competition.

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: Xi Wen is getting married! Throwing her a wild bachelorette party in Vietnam are Xi Wen's best friends, Kimmy & the glamourous Jia Lan. Will it be the awesome night they imagine?

programme.title: The Tag-Along: Devil Fish
programme.desc: A demon sealed by a Taoist medium in a fish is released when a group of kids catches the demon fish and brings it home.

programme.title: All's Well, End's Well 2012
programme.desc: This beloved slapstick comedy series continues with four men on a heroic mission to help four women and wind up experiencing a series of mishaps.

programme.title: Chungking Express
programme.desc: These compilation of two Hong Kong urban love stories depicts how two Hong Kong policemen - both jilted by ex-lovers - find love again in unexpected places.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow
programme.desc: John Woo took his place as one of Hong Kong's premiere action directors with this slick action classic that immortalized Chow Yun Fat, Ti Lung & Leslie Cheung.

programme.title: Murderer
programme.desc: A self-assured chief inspector begins to second-guess himself after a fainting spell damages his short-term memory - and indicates he may be a serial killer.

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: In order to meet his girlfriend's financial ultimatum, Siu Long decides to flip a penthouse. However, he ends up living with the other three investors when things go south.

programme.title: Touch of the Light
programme.desc: Adapted from a true story about a talented blind pianist who meets a talented amateur dancer, this drama captures a journey to their dreams.

programme.title: Wolf Warriors 2
programme.desc: USD800m! Wu Jing powers Asian cinema to break into the world's top 100 grossing films for the first time with this global box-office hit!

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: Based on a true story, a girl named Suki aspire to fulfill her dream after leaving with her cheating boyfriend. Later, when invited to attend his wedding, she schemes to have her revenge.

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: This Singaporean-Malaysian comedy starring Chapman To & Mark Lee revolves around Tin Ba, whose winning streak inspires him to challenge the King of Mahjong in the world championship.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An accident at an offshore drilling platform results in the call for the Transportation Emergency Response Team to save the survivors before the site collapses.

programme.title: Cross
programme.desc: Starring Simon Yam, Nick Cheung & Liu Kai Chi, this disturbing tale depicts how a man, whose wife commits suicide, takes it upon himself to free people from their pain by killing them

programme.title: The Mafia Lady
programme.desc: A young cop, who vows revenge on his parents' murderer, discovers that one of the key assassins is his sister. How will this affect his vendetta?

programme.title: 77 Heartbreaks
programme.desc: When Eva ends her ten-year relationship with Adam, he's shocked by the seeming suddenness of the break-up till reading her private journal reveals it was the culmination of 77 heartbreaks.

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm S11 Ep01
programme.desc: Larry David stars as...Larry David in this acclaimed verite-style comedy series that follows him at home, at work and around town, as he lands himself in various predicaments.

programme.title: The Photograph
programme.desc: When the estranged daughter of a late famed photographer discovers a photograph tucked away in a safe-deposit box, she finds herself on a journey delving into her mother's early life.

programme.title: Jingle Bell Bride
programme.desc: During Christmas, wedding planner Jessica Perez travels to a remote town in Alaska to look for a rare flower for a celebrity client and finds charm and romance.

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: Two best friends find themselves in a no-holds-barred battle when a clerical error causes a clash in wedding dates for the same wedding venue.

programme.title: The Spongebob Squarepants Movie
programme.desc: Spongebob Squarepants leaves Bikini Bottom to track down King Neptune's stolen crown and save Mr. Krabs from execution.

programme.title: Boss Level
programme.desc: Former Special Forces soldier Roy Pulver urgently needs to figure out why he is stuck in a repeating time loop in which he is killed violently in different ways every day.

programme.title: What's Your Number?
programme.desc: Fearing that she is going to be alone forever, Ally goes on a quest to reconnect with her former lovers, searching for the best 'ex' of her life.

programme.title: Me Before You
programme.desc: A young countryside woman and an affluent banker paralyzed in a tragic accident couldn't have less in common, but in this heartbreakingly romance, they gain understanding, and ultimately love.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Harrison Ford stars as the intrepid adventurer on the trail of a cult that enslaves children.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: After settling down to a quieter life, Indy is thrust back into action when his father mysteriously disappears while on a quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: When a threat emerges that puts Bird and Pig Islands in danger, Red, Chuck, Bomb and Mighty Eagle recruit Chuck's sister and team up with pigs to forge an unsteady truce to save their homes.

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: Two best friends find themselves in a no-holds-barred battle when a clerical error causes a clash in wedding dates for the same wedding venue.

programme.title: The Marksman

programme.title: The Conjuring
programme.desc: Two paranormal investigators are called upon to help a family terrorised by a dark presence in a farmhouse.

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: This supernatural thriller follows another real case from the files of renowned demonologists Ed and Lorraine Warren.

programme.title: Just Go With it
programme.desc: A man enlists the help of a woman and her kids to land the woman of his dreams.

programme.desc: The Sea Witch steals the Guppies' magical jewels, so she can rule the Seven Seas! Will the Guppies get their jewels back, and stop her before it's too late?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S4 Ep407
programme.desc: Bubble Puppy disappears after he bites down on ancient magic bone, so the Guppies must embark on an epic booby-trapped adventure to find their lost puppy!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep234
programme.desc: Peppa is playing in the tree-house with the girls. George and the boys stay in the castle that Grandpa Pig built. But when it starts to rain, they rush out to play together in the muddy puddles!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep235
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train and he takes Peppa and George for a ride. Along the way they meet their friends and they all hop on. Peppa and George think it is the best train ever!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep236

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep121
programme.desc: A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Josh is making a Thankful Book and is looking to find out what our friends in the Blue's Clue's house are thankful. We play Blue's Clues to find out what Blue is thankful for.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S2 Ep203
programme.desc: It's Halloween in Axle City, and Blaze, AJ, and all of their friends are excited to 'Truck or Treat.' But when Crusher's plan to steal all of their candy goes awry, he sends their treats far away.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep510

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep521

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep106

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep251
